## Install the package

You can install the latest development version of `jabotR` package from [GitHub](https://github.com/DBOSlab/jabotR) as follows:


```{r}
#| eval: false

#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("DBOSlab/jabotR")
```

:::{.callout-caution}
The steps in this section are only needed if you need to run [...]. If you already have a running [...], then skip this section. 
:::
